description: Party at Carnaval in Rio, come face to face with monkeys and other creatures in the Amazon, or snorkel the aquatic life-filled natural aquariums of Bonito, all with this trusted travel guide to Brazil. Included are photos, maps and comprehensive planning tools to help you get the most out of your trip.
name: Lonely Planet Brazil 10th Edition

Author: Regis St Louis, Gary Chandler, Gregor Clark, Bridget Gleeson, Anna Kaminski, Kevin Raub
